data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your LIFX device.

effect_colorloop.description: Runs an effect with looping colours.

brightness.description: Number indicating brightness of the colour loop, where 1 is the minimum brightness and 255 is the maximum brightness supported by the light.
brightness.name: Brightness value

brightness_pct.description: Percentage indicating the brightness of the colour loop, where 1 is the minimum brightness and 100 is the maximum brightness supported by the light.
brightness_pct.name: Brightness

change.description: Hue movement per period, in degrees on a colour wheel.
change.name: Change

saturation_max.description: Percentage indicating the maximum saturation of the colours in the loop.
saturation_max.name: Maximum saturation

saturation_min.description: Percentage indicating the minimum saturation of the colours in the loop.
saturation_min.name: Minimum saturation

spread.description: Maximum hue difference between participating lights, in degrees on a colour wheel.
spread.name: Spread

effect_colorloop.name: Colour loop effect

speed.description: How fast the colours will move.

effect_pulse.description: Runs a flash effect by changing to a colour and back.

brightness.description: Number indicating brightness of the temporary colour, where 1 is the minimum brightness and 255 is the maximum brightness supported by the light.

brightness_pct.description: Percentage indicating the brightness of the temporary colour, where 1 is the minimum brightness and 100 is the maximum brightness supported by the light.

sky_type.description: The style of sky that will be animated by the effect.
sky_type.name: Sky type

palette.description: List of at least 2 and at most 16 colours as hue (0-360), saturation (0-100), brightness (0-100) and Kelvin (1500-9000) values to paint across the target lights. Overrides the 'Theme' attribute.

power_on.description: Powered off lights will be turned on before painting the theme.

theme.description: Predefined colour theme to paint. Overridden by the 'Palette' attribute.

transition.description: Duration in seconds to paint the theme.
transition.name: Transition

set_state.description: Sets a colour/brightness and possibly turn the light on/off.
